description: Try this flavourful dinner idea featuring roast pumpkin and coconut-lime quinoa all topped with spiced and roasted pumpkin seeds.
name: Coconut & Lime Quinoa with Roast Pumpkin & Seeds Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup woolworths macro tri colour quinoa
0.25 cup mixed pumpkin and sunflower seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 170 degrees (fan forced). Cut the quarter of a pumpkin into quarters, leaving the skin on. Using olive oil, put the cut pumpkin in a roasting pan and roast for approximately 35-40 mins, depending on how large you cut the pieces.

Place the coconut milk and quinoa in a saucepan and bring to the boil, then simmer gently. Add the stock cube. Keep stirring until the quinoa has absorbed all the coconut milk, then squeeze one quarter of the lime in.
With a teaspoon of olive oil, spread the seeds out on a roasting pan and toast for 5 mins or until golden. Garnish with salt, paprika and chilli flakes.
Plate up the quinoa with the pumpkin on top. Garnish with salt, a squeeze of lime and the toasted seeds. Sprinkle with salad leaves to add some greens. Enjoy!
